		Question: who is dustin johnson the golfer
		Answer:
answer: Dustin Johnson is a golfer who was born on June 22, 1984, in Columbia, South Carolina. He turned professional in 2007 and has won 24 PGA Tour events, including two major championships. Johnson is currently ranked number one in the world and is married to Paulina Gretzky with whom he has two children.
